document.full_text: charismatic pop star-turned-president michel martelly took over haiti on saturday, promising to rebuild its earthquake-devastated capital, develop the long-neglected countryside and build a modern army.
document.title: new president takes power in struggling haiti
lines_and_colors: charismatic pop star-turned-president michel martelly took over haiti on saturday, promising to rebuild its earthquake-devastated capital, develop the long-neglected countryside and build a modern army.
